name: Roll, Turn, Repeat
description:
In this game, every level starts with a loop. But to reach the goal, you have to exit the loop. Sound logical huh? Use the arrows on the ground at your advantage to guide your little buddy to the goal. It features 9 levels, with some twists going around.

  • Game powered by Godot Engine 3.2.3
  • Graphics - Paint NET / Inkscape
  • Music and SFX - LMMS/sfxr plugin
  • Font - “Pixeled”

Made for Ludum Dare 47 - "Stuck in a loop"
